#Text=( ( William S. Saturn ) ) :
#Text=You ran for president in 1988 as a member of the Democratic Party .
#Text=Why did you choose to become a member of that party , and what caused you to switch to the Republican Party ?
#Text=Andy Martin : [ The late ] Congressman Jack Kemp and Rev. Pat Robertson invited me to join the Republican Party and I did .
#Text=( ( WSS ) ) :
#Text=Are you still in contact with Pat Robertson ?
#Text=Martin : No.
#Text=( ( WSS ) ) : What is your response to the claims from Robert Gibbs and others that you are Anti-Semitic due to the alleged anti-Jewish language used in some of your previous lawsuits ?
#Text=Martin : Robert Gibbs engaged in a crude political smear based on lies , distortions and misrepresentations .
#Text=For the past four or five years I have been the victim of a pro-Obama dirty tricks operation orchestrated out of Wikipedia.org and the Obama campaign apparatus .
#Text=In one sense , Obama ’s use of malicious smears against me shows how desperate he is to discredit my activity .
#Text=In another sense , the fact that Obama goes to such lengths to attack me is a compliment to the seriousness with which he views both my research and my current presidential campaign .
#Text=The national media may not yet take my presidential campaign seriously but Mr. Obama and his dirty tricksters very much do .
#Text=What does Obama know that the media do n’t ?
#Text=Presidential campaign
#Text=Martin has centered his campaign in the state of New Hampshire and has discussed local issues .
#Text=For environmental reasons , he opposes the Northern Pass transmission line , an energy project slated to connect New England to the hydroelectric resources of Hydro-Québec .
#Text=When asked if the project was under the purview of the office of the presidency , he replied that it requires a presidential finding .

#Text=On July 28 , Martin released a press release that described a planned march against the Northern Pass as " what could be the largest campaign event generated by any presidential candidate in New Hampshire during the 2012 election cycle .

#Text= When asked to go into detail about the event , Martin responded that it was " too time consuming " to provide " personalized analysis " but remarked that " I 'd say we are surprising a lot of people and we have many more rabbits to pull out of the hat as the campaign progresses .
